name: Mt. Bierstadt
route_description: Classic 14er with well-marked trail. Exposed ridge near summit.

name: Grays Peak
route_description: Popular 14er. Often combined with Torreys Peak. Steep final pitch.

name: Torreys Peak
route_description: Accessed from Grays Peak trailhead. Class 2 scramble near summit.

name: Quandary Peak
route_description: One of the easier 14ers. Well-marked trail throughout.

name: Sky Pond
route_description: Stunning alpine lake. Passes Timberline Falls and Lake of Glass.

name: Emerald Lake
route_description: Popular family-friendly hike past Nymph and Dream Lakes.

name: Chasm Lake
route_description: Dramatic lake below Longs Peak east face. Sustained elevation gain.

name: Lake Isabelle
route_description: Easy alpine lake hike with wildflowers in summer. Family-friendly.

name: Blue Lake
route_description: Beautiful cirque lake. Steeper than Lake Isabelle but less crowded.

name: Lost Lake
route_description: Less crowded alternative to Lake Isabelle. Multiple lakes in area.
